welcome.unknown_err_msg: Wi-Fi is turned off during router initialization, please check that your client device has reconnected to the router.
welcome.htmode_160_tips: 160MHz dynamic bandwidth, with high throughput and better coverage, if this function is enabled, you need to wait for 60s to scan the radar signal.
welcome.wifi_restart_loading_text: It may take a few seconds, please wait.
welcome.reconnected_wifi_loading_text: Make sure the device has reconnected to the following WiFi.
